column5: Built in the 1880's during Llano's Iron Boom, this historic home retains many of it's original features including hardwood floors, transom windows, twelve foot ceilings, entry foyer, formal living and dining.  Only 2 1/2 blocks to the courthouse square where you will find unique shops, eateries, wine bar, coffee house and the newly renovated art deco LanTex Theater. The Llano River, one of the cleanest rivers in the nation, is a short 4 blocks away.
column8: CHARMING HISTORIC HOME~ SLEEPS UP TO 10~ DOWNTOWN
